mets:xmlData.dc:description: Image shows students from the Penn Street School. Photograph is listed as the Bailey Street school; however the building looks like the Penn Street School. Back of the photo lists students names marked by numbers. 1. Helen Lemonte 2. Ethel 3. Blanche Gaskill 4. Hazel Delmore 5. Delight Molote 6.Iva Langstaff 7.Mathraime May 8.Dorothy Baxter 9.Marion Chase 10.Evelyn Hill 11.Jesse Y. 12.Frank 13.Linn 16.Robert Ozias 17.Virgle Parker (Emma P. Brother) 18.Millie 19.Ramond Newton 21.Mrlie Fritze(boy) 22.Rosa 23.Margaret Muchmore 24.Thelma McCord 25.Evelyn Dryl 26.Ester Ganter 27.Mildred 28.Dorothy King 29.Lude Nomson 30.Mary Lester 32.Gladys Colson 33.Glen Kendle 35.Alfred Marty 37.Stanley 38.Miss Newby Back of photo also says "Gift of Mrs. B. Forsythe, 303 Silver Shoals Dr. Long Beach 90803.
mets:xmlData.dc:source: Selected photograph from the Whittier History Room photograph collection.

mets:mdRef.LABEL: Whittier Public Library Historical Photograph Collection
